ing: 1 (3 ounce) package orange flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
des: "I made this last year for my Halloween party. Both the kids and adults loved it, and it is super easy."
ins: Combine the vanilla ice cream and orange sherbet in a large bowl. Sprinkle the ice cream and sherbet with orange gelatin. Slowly pour the lemon-lime soda over the ice cream and sherbet; the mixture will be very foamy. Sprinkle a little more orange gelatin mix on top, if desired. Arrange several candy worms in the bowl so they drape over the sides and hang over the edge. Serve in cups and place a candy worm in each cup.
